00009   NoiseParameter::NoiseParameter(){
00010 
00011     
00012     //CRP: Also this is not needed, has to be removed in next release!!!!!
00013     //CAMM: kept it to be aligned with TBTrackUtil class.
00014     memset(this,0,sizeof(NoiseParameter));
00015     _isDead = 0;
00016     _moduleIndex = 0;
00017     _cellIndex = 0;
00018     _cellID0 = 0;
00019     _pedestalBeforeGC = -999;
00020     _noiseBeforeGC = 0;
00021     _pedestalBeforeSIC = -999;
00022     _noiseBeforeSIC = 0;
00023     _pedestal = -999;
00024     _noise = 0;
00025     _cohnoise = 0;
00026   }

00028   NoiseParameter::NoiseParameter(int module_index, int cell_index){
00029     assert(sizeof(NoiseParameter)==
00030            sizeof(int)*numberOfInts+
00031            sizeof(double)*numberOfDoubles);
00032     
00033     memset(this,0,sizeof(NoiseParameter));
00034 
00035     _isDead = 0;
00036     _moduleIndex = module_index;
00037     _cellIndex = cell_index;
00038     _cellID0 = 0;
00039     _pedestalBeforeGC = -999;
00040     _noiseBeforeGC = 0;
00041     _pedestalBeforeSIC = -999;
00042     _noiseBeforeSIC = 0;
00043     _pedestal = -999;
00044     _noise = 0;
00045     _cohnoise = 0;

00049   NoiseParameter::NoiseParameter(int cellID0, int module_index, int cell_index){
00050     assert(sizeof(NoiseParameter)==
00051            sizeof(int)*numberOfInts+
00052            sizeof(double)*numberOfDoubles);
00053     
00054     memset(this,0,sizeof(NoiseParameter));
00055 
00056     _isDead = 0;
00057     _moduleIndex = module_index;

00070   NoiseParameter::NoiseParameter(int cellID0, int module_index, int cell_index, double noise, double pedestal){
00071 
00072     assert(sizeof(NoiseParameter)==
00073            sizeof(int)*numberOfInts+
00074            sizeof(double)*numberOfDoubles);
00075     
00076     memset(this,0,sizeof(NoiseParameter));
00077 
00078     _isDead = 0;
00079     _moduleIndex = module_index;
00080     _cellIndex = cell_index;
00081     _cellID0 = cellID0;
00082     _pedestalBeforeGC = -999;
00083     _noiseBeforeGC = 0;
00084     _pedestalBeforeSIC = -999;
00085     _noiseBeforeSIC = 0;
00086     _pedestal = pedestal;
00087     _noise = noise;
00088     if (noise > 6.0) _cohnoise = sqrt(noise*noise-6.*6.);
00089     else _cohnoise = 0;
00090 
00091   }
00092

00123   void NoiseParameter::setNoise(double aNoise){
